ygData.subject: Re: [Holy Swords]
ygData.msgSnippet: The Fiery Avenger is part of a extremly long quest. That s about all I know about it though. Kananek Dwarven Paladin ... From: Avron Elselynn
ygData.messageBody:
The Fiery Avenger is part of a extremly long quest. That's about all I know
about it though.

Kananek Dwarven Paladin

-----Original Message-----
From: Avron Elselynn <avron@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 13, 1999 11:52 PM
Subject: SV: [eqpaladin] [Holy Swords]


>From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>
>
>I believe it comes from lower guk, rare drop and stuff.. Stats are like,
damage 25 delay 40, AND it has permanent effect haste, which cuts down delay
by 25%, so the delay is really 30.. 25/30.. DROOL!
>
>Also after fear plane opened up, and those two damage 30 weapons appeared..
One WAR and one for SK, I am wondering, is Fiery Avenger supposed to be the
paladin equivalent of these weapons? And if so, where can it be found, I
also heard there is a ranger claw in fear plane with similar stats as the
other two weapons, so only paladin of the hybrids need a similar weapon
now.. But as Hate Plane and Air Plane will open, maybe we will find our
weapon in any of those planes?
>
>- Avron Akizuki - Knight of Truth - Solusek Ro
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
>To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
>Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 11:38 PM
>Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] [Holy Swords]
>
>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Two handed Mithril Sword? Where does that come from I haven't heard of
it.
>>
>> Kananek Dwarven Paladin
>>

months

>> with less effort, and soulfire is CRAP compared to that..
>> >
>> >I am going to guk tonight to try and get ghoulbane, already tried
camping
>> it for 7 hours.. I had better luck in lower guk where I got box of abu
kar
>> and bag of sewn evil eye in 30 minutes.. And I am only level 28 hehe, but
I
>> joined up with a level 45 shaman.. It was a fun ride.. ;)
>> >
>> >Now I am gonna take a bath.. bye..
>> >
>> >- Avron Akizuki(former Elselynn, now married;)
